input: W: Paul, do you remember Jessica's birthday? M: Yeah. It's the day before Teacher's Day., Question: When is Jessica's Birthday? (A) Sep. 8. (B) Sep. 9. (C) Sep. 10.

W: Have you read the book of Gone With the Wind? M: No, but I saw the movie, so I know the story., Question: Why do the man know the story? (A) Because he saw the movie. (B) Because he read the book. (C) Because someone told him before.

W: Oh, this is a beautiful city. I'm really glad I've brought my camera. M: Yes, there are lots of things to take pictures of here. But I hope you will not plan to spend all your time taking pictures. I have some friends who would like to meet you., Question: What does the man want the woman to do? (A) To visit more places in the city. (B) To take a lot of pictures of the beautiful city. (C) To spare some time to meet his friends.
